hanzi-su-wiki:
瞬

Значения

Мигать, моргать

Мнемоника

Справа — вьюнок, который, цепляясь 爫, поворачивается в разные 舛 стороны. Он следит за солнцем, постоянно меняя положение. Глаз 目 же слепнет от солнца и начинает моргать.
purpleculture_pinyin:
shùn
to wink
подмигивать
rtega_mnemonic:
瞬瞬RSwink, blink, in a wink, a flash
  • eye 目 blinking when seeing the legendary ruler 舜
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 舜 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
瞬间 [ shùn jiān ]: in an instant; in a flash
一瞬间 [ yī shùn jiān ]: split second
一瞬 [ yī shùn ]: one instant; very short time; the twinkle of an eye
瞬息万变 [ shùn xī wàn biàn ]: in an instant a myriad changes (idiom); rapid substantial change
瞬时 [ shùn shí ]: instantaneous
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 舜 [ shùn ] legendary ruler
heisig_chinese_memo: At the vulture club there are exotic dancers which you can't keep your eyes off of and instantly make you feel excited. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: wink, eye, Rose of Sharon, birdhouse, birdcage, claw, vulture, crown, sunglasses, dancing legs, ballerina, evening
koohiiStory1: Imagine Snoopy winking with his big eyes (and a happy smile) standing next to Woodstocks Birdhouse, woodstock being so cool that he wears little sunglasses.
koohiiStory2: What a dilemna, you wore SUNGLASSES over your EYES when you went to the BIRDHOUSE so you wouldn´t be recognized - but now you can´t WINK at the girl you want!
jp_example_words:
瞬き(またたき): wink, twinkling (of stars), flicker (of light)
一瞬(いっしゅん): moment, instant
瞬間(しゅんかん): moment, second, instant
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your eye gets kicked with a cleat that came careening toward your forehead when it popped off someone doing a dance, and you blink.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Well, of course you blink, you can't control that. And when a cleat come hurtling toward your eye it blinks automatically.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You blink and blink and soon (しゅん) there are tears coming out of them too. You try to blink them away but it's not working. Soon you're crying and blinking and crying some more.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Soon the person who's cleat hit you is running over and trying to apologize and stop your crying, but it's too late.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 舜 (シュン быстрое движение).
Ru_Radicals: 冖 (ва), 夕 (вечер), 爪 (ноготь), 牛 (корова), 目 (глаз), 舛 (танцующие ноги)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the morning glory (舜) makes your eye (目) wink
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At the vulture club there are exotic dancers which you can't keep your eyes off of and instantly make you feel excited. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " head " to the sound of " Shun ". The original meaning is blinking. "Said the text": "Shun, also shake the opening and closing number," Xu Xuan-called " instant " is " Shun 's Popular. See "瞚".

Examples of the original meaning of " shun " are as in "Liezi. "Tang Question": "You first learn not instantaneously, and then you can shoot it." "Song History. Biography of Wenyuan. "Su Xun": "In order to control the mind first, the Taishan Mountain will cover the front and the color will not change. The elk will thrive on the left without blinking, and then be able to wait for the enemy."

The extension of " swift " means a blink of an eye, and it means a very short time and an instant. Such as "Selected Works. The Preface of Lu Shiheng's "Wen Fu": "Look at the past and the present in a short period of time, and caress the world in a flash." Tang Dynasty Wang Bo "Preface to Xue Shenghua at the official seat in Mianzhou in the autumn night": "The district of Ran Pu is often regarded as a human A hundred years is like a flash."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " head " to the sound of " Shun ". The original meaning is blinking.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「舜」聲。本義是眨眼。《說文》：「瞚，開闔目數搖也。」徐鉉謂「瞬」是「瞚」的俗體。參見「瞚」。

　　「瞬」用本義的例子如《列子．湯問》：「爾先學不瞬，而後可言射矣。」《宋史．文苑列傳．蘇洵》：「為將之道，當先治心，太山覆於前而色不變，麋鹿興於左而目不瞬，然後可以待敵。」

　　「瞬」引申表示一眨眼的工夫，意謂極短暫的時間、瞬間。如《文選．陸士衡〈文賦〉並序》：「觀古今於須臾，撫四海於一瞬。」唐代王勃〈秋夜於綿州群官席別薛昇華序〉：「然僕之區區，常以為人之百年，猶如一瞬。」

Liushutong characters (7)

瞬字的基本解释

瞬
shùn
眨眼，眼球一动：“尔先学不瞬，而后可言射矣”。一瞬即逝。
极短的时间：转瞬。瞬间。瞬时。瞬即。瞬华（指短暂的时光）。瞬息。瞬时速度。

瞬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shùn］
［《廣韻》舒閏切，去稕，書。］
(1)目动；眨眼。
(2)引申为闪烁。
(3)一眨眼工夫。极言时间短暂。
(4)看；注视。

瞬字的英文翻译

◎ 瞬
twinkling, wink

瞬字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞬； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页817第23
【廣韻】舒閏切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】輸閏切，?音舜。目自動也。【列子·湯問篇】紀昌學射於飛衞，衞曰：爾先學不瞬，而後可言射矣。【宋史·韓世忠傳】目瞬如電。　又【埤雅】木槿朝生夕隕，一名舜。蓋瞬之義取諸此。【陸機·文賦】觀古今之須臾，撫四海於一瞬。【司馬法嚴位篇】一人之禁，無過瞬息。　【玉篇】與瞚同。【集韻】亦作眴䀢瞤。

瞬字的源字形

瞬字的起名意思

眨眼。

instant
shùn

Very short time: in a flash. moment. Instantaneous. Instantly. Shunhua (refers to a short time). Fleeting. Instantaneous speed.

(1) Eye movement; blinking.
(2) The extension is flickering.
(3) A blink of an eye. Extremely short time.
(4) Look; watch.

[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　shun; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 817 23
[Guang Yun] Shu Run Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Lose Run Cut,? Yin Shun. The goal is also automatic. [Liezi·Tangwen Chapter] Ji Chang learned to shoot from Feiwei, Wei said: You first learn not to shoot, and then you can shoot. [Song History·Han Shizhong Biography] The eyes are like electricity.　[Biya] Mu Jinchao was born at Xifeng, a Shun. The meaning of Gai Shun is taken from this. [Lu Ji·Wen Fu] Observe the needs of the past and the present, and caress the world in a flash. [Sima Law Strict Position] Forbidden by one person, there is no transient.　【Jade Article】Same as Hao. [Jiyun] also used as a singularity.
instant
Source glyph
instant
Name meaning
Blink.
形声字。目表意,其古文字形体像眼睛,表示和眼睛有关;舜(sham)表声。本义是眼珠转动,眨眼。引申指一眨眼的短暂
时间。
一貶眼(形容时间极短暂):~间1转~1~息万变。
~间 ~息 ~息万变 一~ 转~ ~即逝
shùn
-- e
瞬
瞬
---
Пиктофонетические символы.
Идеограмма головы означает, что ее древние символы подобны глазам, что указывает на то, что они связаны с глазами; притворство означает звук.
Первоначальный смысл - поворачивать глаза и моргать.
В более широком смысле, это относится к короткому времени в мгновение ока.
Унизительный взгляд (для описания времени очень мало): ~ 1 ход ~ 1 ~ остальное постоянно меняется.
~ Прерывистый ~ Интерес ~ Интерес постоянно меняется ~ Поворот ~~ мимолетный
мгновенное
мгновенное
shùn
I гл.
моргать, мигать
先学不瞬而后可言射矣 сначала научиться не моргать, а потом можно говорить о стрельбе
II сущ.
миг, мгновение
一瞬之间 в один миг
Radicals: 目, 冖, 舛  (eye, forehead, dance, cleat)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your eye gets kicked with a cleat that came careening toward your forehead when it popped off someone doing a dance, and you blink.
Well, of course you blink, you can't control that. And when a cleat come hurtling toward your eye it blinks automatically.
Reading Mnemonic
You blink and blink and soon (しゅん) there are tears coming out of them too. You try to blink them away but it's not working. Soon you're crying and blinking and crying some more.
Soon the person who's cleat hit you is running over and trying to apologize and stop your crying, but it's too late.
